name: Habitat for Humanity Restore
materials: Brick(s); Carpet; Carpet Padding; Ceiling Tiles; Ceramic Tiles; Concrete (Set); Construction Materials (Reuse); Gift Bags; Drywall; Household Goods; Linoleum; Ornaments; Porcelain; Roofing Materials; Stone; Windows; Wood; Cables & Connectors; Cell Phones; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; Laptop Computers; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Portable Media Players; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; VCRs; Video Game Systems; Blu-Ray Players; Digital Converter Boxes; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: The ReStore raises funds by selling merchandise and, after expenses, uses all profits to build more homes.  Habitat also provides families an opportunity to buy building materials that they may not otherwise be able to afford. This will help raise the standards of housing. By recycling goods that would have been sent to a landfill, the ReStore also helps reduce waste disposal costs. If you have materials to donate which are clean and in good condition, please call for more information. The Habitat ReStore takes most materials and the staff will be glad to talk with you.
